-= Info about application 'ExecIf' =-
[Synopsis] Executes dialplan application, conditionally
[Description] ExecIF (<expr>?<appiftrue>(<args>)[:<appiffalse>(<args>)]) If <expr> is true, execute and return the result of <appiftrue>(<args>). If <expr> is true, but <appiftrue> is not found, then the application will return a non-zero value.
